text: hi everyone today I'm making clay pot
fry rice how come they come
it's basically fried rice it enough and
served in a clay pot so the rice form a

helps to keep the rice warm when you
serve let's begin you will need 3 cups
of one day all cooked rice tuna Graham
or seven hours of meat you can hear
chicken shrimp or or some mushrooms cut
into small dices one cup of diced onion
1 cup of sweet Khans
half a cup of diced Piper and also some
chopped green onions season the meat you
will a teaspoon of minced garlic and
shallot some salt pepper sugar chicken
stock about half a teaspoon each also
season the cooked rice with some salt
pepper sugar chicken stock about half a
teaspoon edge mix well and crack in two
eggs now mix well again until all the
rice grain are separated and the egg
will form or coating outside each Drive
rings next heat a tablespoon of oil in
the pan and then fry a teaspoon of
minced garlic until fragrant and add the
diced onion and stir fry until it turns
quite translucent now toss in the pork
and stir-fry until it's no longer pink
after that at the corns and the
pineapple stir fry for a couple of
minutes and then transfer to a bowl next
heat 2 tablespoons of chili oil or a nap
- all in a large wok then add the rice
and toss well if you want to have golden
and quite crispy rice you want to do a
spatula to press it down like this then
let it cook under medium low heat for
about 3 to 5 minutes the rice at the
bottom will form into a thing this can
is more crispy now it's time to transfer
the stir-fry back stir well and season
to your taste again with some more salt
and pepper
transfer the fried rice into the clay
pot heat the clay pot on low heat for
about five to ten minute you will hear
the popping sales of the rice we also
form a nice golden crispy crust at the
bottom
finally some chilies and spring onion
